Title: Provides representation to veterans for certain civil matters
Summary: Provides representation to veterans that are at or below four hundred percent of the federal poverty guidelines for matters involving children, sustenance and real property proceedings.
LawCode: Add Art 18-C §§723 - 723-a, amd §722, County L; amd §1303, RPAP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the county law and the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to providing representation to veterans for certain civil matters
